content:
The 2024 ASF Open Source Days symposium has a virtual component this year that started yesterday (Tuesday) through Thursday. It is free for anyone to attend:
https://events.linuxfoundation.org/open-source-days/program/virtual-town-halls/

Looks to be a preview of what will also be presented at Siggraph, and covers a number of codes that we work with (or could work with) including MaterialX, OIIO, OpenPBR, OSL, and OpenEXR. OpenCue has awesome potential for BRL-CAD render management.
